documents.name: Terms and Conditions
documents.text:
Terms &. ConditionsSupport2021-07-25T01:36:18+00:00Terms &. Conditions

Please read this agreement carefully before proceeding

Currency Hub LLC
Attn: Coin Monster Store
30 N. Gould Ave Ste R.
Sheridan, WY 82801
+1 (307) 429-2003

Welcome to CoinMonster.store

These Terms of Use describe the terms and conditions applicable to your access and use of the website at CoinMonster.store. This statement is a legally binding agreement between you as the user(s) of the Site (referred to as “you”, “Member”, “Customer” or “User” hereinafter) and Currency Hub LLC (referred to as “we”, “our”, “us” or “Coin Monster”, “site” hereinafter), Please read these terms and conditions carefully before ordering any Products from our site.

This terms and conditions shall be governed by the laws of the Wyoming, United States. All disputes arising from or in relation to this Terms of Service shall be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the competent court of Wyoming for litigation.

User Agreement

By accessing, browsing or use this website, you are agreeing to be bound by these website’s terms &. conditions of use, all applicable laws &. regulations, while agreeing that you are responsible for compliance with any applicable local laws. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this website. The materials contained in this website are protected by applicable copyright and trademark laws.

  1. Agreement Condition

1.1 As a condition of your access to and use of the Site or Services, you agree that you will comply with all applicable laws and regulations when using the Site or Services.

1.2 You agree to use the Site or Services solely for your own private and internal purposes. You agree that (a) you will not copy, reproduce, download, re-publish, sell, distribute or resell any Services or any information, text, images, graphics, video clips, sound, directories, files, databases or listings, etc available on or through the Site (the “Site Content”), and (b) you will not copy, reproduce, download, compile or otherwise use any Site Content for the purposes of operating a business that competes with Coin Monster, or otherwise commercially exploiting the Site Content. Systematic retrieval of Site Content from the Site to create or compile, directly or indirectly, a collection, compilation, database or directory (whether through robots, spiders, automatic devices or manual processes) without written permission from Coin Monster is prohibited. Use of any content or materials on the Site for any purpose not expressly permitted in the Terms is prohibited.

1.3 You must read Coin Monster’s Privacy Policy which governs the protection and use of personal information about Users in the possession of Coin Monster and our affiliates. You agree to the use of the personal information about you in accordance with the Privacy Policy.

1.4 Coin Monster may allow Users to access to content, products or services offered by third parties through hyperlinks (in the form of word link, banners, channels or otherwise), . to such third parties’ web site. You are cautioned to read such web site’ terms and conditions and/or privacy policies before using the Site. You acknowledge that Coin Monster has no control over such third parties’ web site, does not monitor such web site, and shall not be responsible or liable to anyone for such web site, or any content, products or services made available on such web site.

1.5 You agree not to undertake any action to undermine the integrity of the computer systems or networks of Coin Monster and/or any other User nor to gain unauthorized access to such computer systems or networks.

1.6 You agree not to undertake any action which may undermine the integrity of Coin Monster’s feedback system, such as leaving positive feedback for yourself using secondary Member IDs or through third parties or by leaving unsubstantiated negative feedback for another User.

2.User’s Responsibilities

2.1 User must be registered on the Site to use some Services. Except with Coin Monster’s approval, one User may only register one user account on the Site. Coin Monster may cancel or terminate a User’s account if Coin Monster has reasons to suspect that the User has concurrently registered or controlled two or more user accounts. Further, Coin Monster may reject User’s application for registration for any reason.

2.2 Upon registration on the Site, Coin Monster shall assign an account and issue a user ID and password (the latter shall be chosen by a registered User during registration) to each registered User. . Upon becoming a Coin Monster User, you consent to authorize Coin Monster to store and use your information in accordance with the Privacy Policy.

2.3 A set of User ID and password is unique to a single account. Each user shall be solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality and security of your user ID and password and for all activities that occur under your account. No user may share, assign, or permit the use of your User account, ID or password by another person outside of the User’s own business entity. User agrees to notify Coin Monster immediately if you become aware of any unauthorized use of your password or your account or any other breach of security of your account.

2.4 User agrees that all activities that occur under your account will be deemed to have been authorized by the User.

2.5 User shall have the option to cancel the order only when prior to shipping by contacting our support center. And Coin Monster reserves the right to cancel the order for operation strategy with a prior notice to User account. However, once the order has been dispatched, the order cannot be canceled, changed, or refunded. Upon receipt of the package, our Return policy comes into effect.

2.6 User shall be respected to have the option to subscribe or cancel newsletter subscription upon registration.

2.7 User understands and agrees that Coin Monster shall have the right to temporarily or permanently terminate all or part of the services at any time in accordance with its own business needs(including but not limited to the cases like violate the terms and condition of Coin Monster, unacceptable and unreasonable comments or behaviors towards Coin Monster’s brand image ).

2.8 If you have any concerns or complaints regarding our service, please email us directly at Contact Us. You also have the right to make a complaint to official authorities. We would, however, appreciate the chance to deal with your concerns before you approach the third parties, so please do contact us in the first instance.

  1. Acceptance Of Order Terms

3.1 Please note that there may be certain orders that we are unable to accept and must cancel. Coin Monster reserves the right, at sole discretion, to refuse or cancel any order for any reason. Some situations that may result in your order being canceled include limitations on quantities available for purchase, inaccuracies or errors in product or pricing information, or problems identified by our credit and fraud avoidance department. We may also require additional verifications or information before accepting any order. We will contact you if all or any portion of your order is canceled or if additional information is required to accept your order.

Given the popularity and/or supply constraints of some of our products, Coin Monster may have to limit the number of products available for purchase. Coin Monster reserves the right to change quantities available for purchase at any time, even after you place an order.

3.2 When you make a purchase. you agree that the risk of loss transfers from Coin Monster to you from the moment we deliver your order to the carrier.

You will bear all related liabilities and risks during the third-party transportation of your order.

3.3 For warranty and return, users should agree with the terms on Return policy.

  1. Conditions Of Use

4.1 Disclaimer

The materials on Coin Monster website are provided “as is”. Coin Monster makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties, including without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights. Further, Coin Monster does not warrant or make any representations concerning the accuracy, likely results, or reliability of the use of the materials on its Internet website or otherwise relating to such materials or on any other website linked to this website.

4.2 Limitations

In no event shall Coin Monster or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption,) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on Coin Monster, even if Coin Monster or a Coin Monster authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage. Because some jurisdictions do not allow limitations on implied warranties, or limitations of liability for consequential or incidental damages, these limitations may not apply to you.

4.3 Revisions &. Errata

The materials appearing on Coin Monster.com website could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. And, Coin Monster.com does not warrant that any of the materials on its website are accurate, complete, or current. Also, Coin Monster. may make changes to the materials contained on its website at any time without notice. Furthermore, Coin Monster.com does not make any commitment to update the materials.

4.5 Links

The website Coin Monster has not reviewed all of the websites linked to its Internet website and is not responsible for the contents of any such linked website. The inclusion of any such links does not imply endorsement by Coin Monster of the website. Use of any such linked website is at the user’s own risk.

4.6 Website Terms of Use Modifications

The website CoinMonster.Store may revise these terms of use for its website at any time without any prior notice. By using this website you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these terms &. conditions of use.

documents.name: Privacy Policy
documents.text:
Privacy PolicySupport2021-08-22T05:38:11+00:00Coin Monster Store

Currency Hub LLC
Attn: Coin Monster Store
30 N. Gould Ave Ste R.
Sheridan, WY 82801
+1 (307) 429-2003

A summary: Our goal is to collect only enough data to let you view the site properly and to allow you to pay for, &. for us to ship the stuff you buy. If you set up an account we store the information you provide but an account is not required. We also collect IP address of anyone who trys to “hack” our site.

If you pay by by credit card we never see or store you card information we just get a token from our payment processor.
If you pay with cryptocurrency, your transactions are stored on the respective blockchain but we don’t save or share that information.

Our website address is: https://coinmonster.store.

It is Currency Hub LLC’s policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect while operating our website. This Privacy Policy applies to https://coinmonster.store (hereinafter, “us”, “we”, or “https://coinmonster.store”). We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting personally identifiable information you may provide us through the Website. We have adopted this privacy policy (“Privacy Policy”) to explain what information may be collected on our Website, how we use this information, and under what circumstances we may disclose the information to third parties. This Privacy Policy applies only to information we collect through the Website and does not apply to our collection of information from other sources.

This Privacy Policy, together with the Terms and conditions posted on our Website, set forth the general rules and policies governing your use of our Website. Depending on your activities when visiting our Website, you may be required to agree to additional terms and conditions.

Website Visitors

Currency Hub LLC may temporarily collects non-Personal Identifiable Information (PII) of the sort that web browsers and servers typically make available, such as the browser type, language preference, referring site, and the date and time of each visitor request. We use this data if needed to support our firewall/security efforts.

Gathering of Personal Identifiable Information (PII)

Certain visitors to Currency Hub LLC’s websites choose to interact with Currency Hub LLC in ways that require Currency Hub LLC to gather personally-identifying information. The amount and type of information that Currency Hub LLC gathers depends on the nature of the interaction. For example, we ask visitors who sign up for a blog at https://thecurrencyhub.io/ to provide a username and email address.

Security

The security of your Personal Information is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

Links To External Sites

Our Service may contain links to external sites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third party link, you will be directed to that third party’s site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy and terms and conditions of every site you visit.

We have no control over, and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites, products or services.

Protection of Certain Personal Identifiable Information (PII)

Currency Hub LLC discloses potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying information only to those of its employees, contractors and affiliated organizations that (i) need to know that information in order to process it on Currency Hub LLC’s behalf or to provide services available at Currency Hub LLC’s website, and (ii) that have agreed not to disclose it to others. Some of those employees, contractors and affiliated organizations may be located outside of your home country. by using Currency Hub LLC’s website, you consent to the transfer of such information to them. Currency Hub LLC will not rent or sell potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying information to anyone.

Affiliate Disclosure

This site uses affiliate links and does earn a commission from certain links. This does not affect your purchases or the price you may pay.

Cookies

Currency Hub LLC uses “Cookies”, similar technologies and services provided by others to display personalized content, appropriate advertising and store your preferences on your computer.

A cookie is a string of information that a website stores on a visitor’s computer, and that the visitor’s browser provides to the website each time the visitor returns. Currency Hub LLC uses cookies to help Currency Hub LLC identify and track visitors, their usage of https://coinmonster.store/, and their website access preferences. Currency Hub LLC visitors who do not wish to have cookies placed on their computers should set their browsers to refuse cookies before using Currency Hub LLC’s websites, with the drawback that certain features of Currency Hub LLC’s websites may not function properly without the aid of cookies.

By continuing to navigate our website without changing your cookie settings, you hereby acknowledge and agree to Currency Hub LLC’s use of cookies.

E-commerce

Those who engage in transactions with Currency Hub LLC – by purchasing Currency Hub LLC’s services or products, are asked to provide additional information, including as necessary the personal and financial information required to process those transactions. In each case, Currency Hub LLC collects such information only insofar as is necessary or appropriate to fulfill the purpose of the visitor’s interaction with Currency Hub LLC. Currency Hub LLC does not disclose personally-identifying information other than as described below. And visitors can always refuse to supply personally-identifying information, with the caveat that it may prevent them from engaging in certain website-related activities.

Privacy Policy Changes

Although most changes are likely to be minor, Currency Hub LLC may change its Privacy Policy from time to time, and in Currency Hub LLC’s sole discretion. Currency Hub LLC encourages visitors to frequently check this page for any changes to its Privacy Policy. Your continued use of this site after any change in this Privacy Policy will constitute your acceptance of such change.

Facebook Twitter LinkedIn Email WhatsApp

points.title: The court of law governing the terms is in Wyoming
points.quoteText: This terms and conditions shall be governed by the laws of the Wyoming, United States.
